revised_title: Purification of Dispersed Rat Adrenal Cells by Column Filtration
tldr: The authors developed a simple and rapid method for purifying specific cell populations in dispersed rat adrenal preparations using column filtration. They filtered the cells through a column of Sephadex G-10 or G-15, separating smaller cells like zona reticularis and zona glomerulosa from larger zona fasciculata cells. This method maintained high enrichment and acceptable cell recovery levels while yielding viable cells.
